snippet: The agreement will bring daily league highlights, new original series and access to some live games to Verizon’s mobile video streaming service Go90.
abstract: Verizon Communications and National Basketball Assn are expected to announce partnership to offer original content to Verizon's mobile video streaming service Go90; deal also makes Verizon official wireless provider of NBA.
lead_paragraph: The agreement will bring daily league highlights, new original series and access to some live games to Verizon’s mobile video streaming service Go90.

headline.main: Verizon and N.B.A. Form Partnership for Go90 Content
headline.print_headline: Verizon and N.B.A. Form Partnership for Mobile Content
